tag_list: home-improvement, diy-solutions-and-projects, organizing, decorating, good-parenting, healthy-living, diet-and-exercise
overview: Ingrid Callot is a wife, a mom, a cosmetics representative and a blogger. She is a home improvement geek and would like to meet Martha Stewart someday. In fact, her fantasy is to spend a night in Vegas with Oprah Winfrey, Martha Stewart, and the Dalai Lama, playing mind games on the dealer on the craps table, and then watching â€œHoardersâ€ in our hotel room TV while feasting on the mini bar.

milestones.description: Ingrid Callot is an expert on getting rid of the most stubborn household stains.
I, Ingrid Callot, would love to build an army of recyclists through my blogs.  Read on for more… http://bit.ly/Jc395m.
Ingrid Callot, together with husband Roger and son Jacob, enjoys working on DIY projects sure to give your home a cost-efficient tweaking. http://bit.ly/Jc395m
